Understate: The claim may understate the fact that Hobby Lobby's health care plan does provide coverage for 16 out of the 20 FDA-approved forms of contraception.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the salesclerk at Hobby Lobby will not have access to contraception through her employer's health care plan, which may not be entirely accurate.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the salesclerk will not be able to access contraception through her employer's health care plan.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, as Hobby Lobby's website states that they do provide coverage for the other 16 forms of contraception.
